entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
